Text.Page:
Our holy ground is defiled by greedy swine blinded by the lure of Thulsa's dirty money.

The vicious runekeepers and maligos conquerers. Not you. You're on our side.

Bring me the beasts' hearts, and I'll pay you by the pound.

It's been a long time since I laughed so hard!

Thank you for punishing the greedy swine. Take this small token of my appreciation.

Please, I insist. My money isn't as dirty as Thulsa's.
Take care of some vicious runekeepers and maligos conquerers, then bring me their hearts, <PCNAME>.
